short_summary: Requisition of 44,000 boxes/containers stored in Quebec and Ontario, for destruction and removal. Estimated contract value: $572,544.59
full_summary:
# Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for Document Retrieval and Destruction Services

## Background
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is issuing an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) to procure document retrieval and destruction services. The requirement is to retrieve approximately 44,000 boxes/container (1.2 cubic feet each) stored in several secured warehouse facilities in Quebec and Ontario.

## Description of the Requirement
The contractor will be required to:
* Physically retrieve the boxes from their secure storage and make them available to NRCan for pickup
* Remove the information pertaining to the retrieved boxes from a proprietary database
* Provide destruction services at NRCan’s request

## Criteria for Assessment of Statement of Capabilities
To be considered for this requirement, suppliers must demonstrate the following:
* Ability to access files in the current secured storage facility
* Ability to remove records from the proprietary system

## Justification for Pre-Identified Supplier
The pre-identified supplier, Iron Mountain Canada Operations ULC, is the only known supplier that meets the mandatory criteria.

## Notice of Exclusions and Limited Tendering Reasons
Exclusions and limited tendering reasons are invoked under the following agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

## Cost Estimate
The estimated value of the contract is $572,544.59 (inclusive of applicable taxes).

## Contact Information
For inquiries and submission of statements of capabilities, please contact:
Name: Shazeen Dhanani
E-mail: Shazeen.Dhanani@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
Contact Phone: 9999999
---

This rewritten entry highlights the most important details about the Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for document retrieval and destruction services. It is a formal notice to the supplier community that NRCan intends to award a contract to a pre-identified supplier, Iron Mountain Canada Operations ULC. The notice provides information on the description of the requirement, criteria for assessment of statement of capabilities, justification for pre-identified supplier, and contact information.
